EmailTemplate.description: What NCR Freshop Can Do for Me
EmailTemplate.name: eCommerce Freshop Campaign.12-27-21 RET eCommerce Freshop Campaign Phase 2 Email
EmailTemplate.subject: What Can NCR Freshop Do for Me?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Offering a seamless, digital shopping experience is easier than you think. Let us help take your online grocery shopping to the next level. Introducing NCR Freshop, an online shopping experience. Built with retailers like you in mind, it: - Delivers personalized web and mobile ordering - Offers an efficient fulfillment process - Provides a seamless pick-up and delivery process - Integrates with existing loyalty and promotions - Easily integrates into current systems See what NCR Freshop can do for you. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
